Type.Name: SurroundingDeletedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SurroundingDeletedHandler(object o, SurroundingDeletedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed SurroundingDeletedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the SurroundingDeletedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the SurroundingDeletedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the SurroundingDeletedHandler is removed from the event.
